goals.description: Create unified multi-language CLI coordinator that can invoke commands across all language SDKs
goals.success_criteria: CLI can execute tsk commands in Python, Rust, JavaScript, Ruby, C#, Go, PHP, Java, and Bash with consistent interface

goals.description: Implement cross-language configuration management system using peanu.tsk files
goals.success_criteria: Single peanu.tsk file can configure all language SDKs with hierarchical override support

goals.description: Create multi-language package management and dependency resolution system
goals.success_criteria: Can install, update, and manage dependencies across all supported languages from single interface
